attributes.mlflow.chat.messages:
[{"role": "user", "content": "請用 1 個句子總結以下內容，保持準確性：

內容：Climate change continues to affect ecosystems worldwide at an alarming rate. Rising global temperatures have led to more frequent extreme weather events including hurricanes, floods, and wildfires. Polar ice caps are melting faster than predicted, contributing to sea level rise that threatens coastal communities. Scientists warn that without immediate and dramatic reductions in greenhouse gas emissions, many of these changes may become irreversible. International cooperation remains essential but politically challenging.
"}, {"content": "氣候變化正以驚人的速度影響全球生態系統，導致極端天氣事件增多、海平面上升威脅沿海地區，科學家警告若不立即大幅減少溫室氣體排放，許多變化可能不可逆轉，而國際合作雖然必要但政治上具挑戰性。", "refusal": null, "role": "assistant", "annotations": []}]
